name: Forest Woodman
description:
Are you tired of the routine and dullness of daily life? Want something new? Then what about forester's adventures in the most ordinary forest?
Foresters are in danger at every turn, but you need to keep an eye on the forest, something happens all the time -wolves wander around, then bears, and sometimes someone even more terrible ...
Try to survive for a week in such conditions, let's see how you can cope.

Features:

-Every day in the forest there are new problems, help the forester solve them.

-Pistols? Rifles? Why is this necessary if there is a good old shovel that will send any creep to the other side.

-Forest, your own world, which will help you both settle in and feed yourself.

-There are no epic fights or large-scale battles, but the variety of adventures will pleasantly surprise you.

- Nice soundtrack will help you immerse yourself in the atmosphere.
